amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of the funds to transform the National Energy Technology Laboratory into a government-owned, contractor-operated laboratory, or to consolidate or close the National Energy Technology Laboratory.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of the funds to transform the National Energy Technology Laboratory into a government-owned, contractor-operated laboratory, or to consolidate or close the National Energy Technology Laboratory.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McKinley amendment (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McKinley amendment (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A035) offered by Mr. McKinley.
